steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Select the text that contains the bullets you want to delete.
Click on the 'Home' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Paragraph' section, click on the 'Bullets' button to open the bullets menu.
Select the 'None' option from the bullets menu to remove the bullets from the selected text.
Verify that the bullets have been successfully deleted.
Save the changes to the document.
